title: Scheduled maintenance
message: We will be performing updates to iNZight Lite from December 20 to December 22, 2023. During this time, iNZight Lite may be unavailable or unstable.

title: Ongoing connection issues
message: We are aware of some connectivity issues with Lite. If you are unable to use Lite, please use the alternative link: lite-prod.up.railway.app. Please note that this version has lower resources and may be less performant. Please use this only if you have tried the other troubleshooting steps first.

title: Additional troubleshooting tips
message: If you are experiencing immediate disconnect, and private window/different browser doesn't work, try hard refreshing the page a few times. This is usually CTRL/CMD + F5 or CTRL/CMD + SHIFT + R. If not immediate, wait 15-20 minutes and try again. You may need to refresh 5-10 times.

title: New Release 2025.04
message: We have released a new version over the break, fixing a few critical bugs. See the changelog for details. If you experience connectivity issues, please follow the troubleshooting steps. If you still have trouble, use a back-up: lite-prod.up.railway.app or lite-staging.up.railway.app.

title: New infrastructure in development
message: We have been working on a new deployment architecture, with the aim of improving performance and preventing access issues some users have been experiencing. If you would like to help us test the new system, please head to lite.dev.docker.stat.auckland.ac.nz/. Please let us know if you experience issues by contacting inzightlite_support@stat.auckland.ac.nz
